tool.name: twoBitToFa
tool.description: Convert all or part of .2bit file to FASTA
tool.command:
twoBitToFa '$twobit_input' '$fasta_output'
#if $seq -seq='$seq' #end if
#if str($start) -start=$start #end if
#if str($end) -end=$end #end if
#if $seqList -seqList='$seqList' #end if
$noMask

param.label: Restrict this to just one sequence
Start at given position in sequence
End at given position in sequence
File containing list of the desired sequence names (Optional)
param.help: It must be in the format seqSpec[:start-end], e.g. chr1 or chr1:0-189 where coordinates are half-open zero-based, i.e. [start,end)

param.label: Convert sequence to all upper case?

tool.help:
**What it does**
twoBitToFa is a tool to convert all or part of .2bit file to FASTA.
For more information, check the `user manual <https://genome.ucsc.edu/goldenpath/help/twoBit.html>`_.
